description: {"blocks":[{"key":"9a33t","text":"Protocol for the preparation of Ligation mix II for automated single-stranded DNA library preparation using the ssDNA2.0 method (Gansauge et al. 2020). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"556bm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dqk6j","text":"References","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ra7v","text":"Gansauge, M.-T., Aximu-Petri, A., Nagel, S., \u0026 Meyer, M. (2020). Manual and automated preparation of single-stranded DNA libraries for the sequencing of DNA from ancient biological remains and other sources of highly degraded DNA. Nature Protocols, 15, 2279-2300.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
document: {"blocks":[{"key":"2skqf","text":"Note","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3m98h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1f5d7","text":"This protocol describes the preparation of five (or multiples of five) tubes containing Ligation mix II. Each tube suffices for a 96-well library preparation plate (containing 96 + 20 reactions to account for dead volumes and loss of reagent). It is advisable to prepare 2-4 batches (10-20 tubes) at once. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fk64l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"422nj","text":"Materials","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1tndc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"210hc","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b3gm9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ftfqq","text":"Equipment","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9bh7a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6gib1","text":"Benchtop thermo mixer (e.g. ThermoMixer C; Eppendorf, cat. no. 5382000015)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d2pav","text":"Thermal cycler for PCR strip tubes (e.g. Veriti 96-Well fast Thermal Cycler, cat. no. 4375305)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"kf21","text":"Label printer (e.g. Brady M611, cat. no. M611-EU-LABS) and tube labels (e.g. Labels for TLS2200/TLS PC Link/Polyester, cat. no. PTL-82-499)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"36i3p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ao9iu","text":"Protocol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eq8lt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"910f3","text":"1. Prepare the double-stranded adapter by combining the reagents below in a 1.5 ml Eppendorf Safe-Lock tube. Mix properly, spin down and aliquot the mix to four wells of a PCR strip-tube (75 µl each well). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"662ce","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3blt4","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9bklv","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bh9eo","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dfm25","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d94bq","text":"2. Incubate PCR strip-tube(s) in thermal cycler using the following profile: 95 °C 10 sec, ramp to 14 °C at 0.1°C/s. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ofsr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2sbf8","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bvphn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"75gon","text":"3. Combine the contents of all four wells into a 1.5 ml Eppendorf Safe-Lock tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"288sp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ifo9","text":"4. Add 300 µl TE buffer to obtain 600 µl of 100µM CL53/TL178. Mix by vortexing and spin down.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cgsdk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"40geo","text":"5. Prepare the Ligation mix II in 5 ml screw-cap tubes by combining the following reagents.
